description:
Typographic Clock

It has a light theme available and the color is configurable!

Based on: "Time Series 2: Typographic Clock"(https://codepen.io/graphilla/pen/zEZKpN)
by Peter Norton (https://codepen.io/graphilla)

Source repo: https://github.com/TurboLion/Typographic-Clock
title: Typographic Clock
